name: BulkRetrieveBookings
description:
Retrieve multiple bookings using booking IDs.

This tool retrieves a list of bookings by their IDs. It requires appropriate OAuth scopes for buyer or seller level permissions.

parameters.name: booking_ids
parameters.description: A non-empty list of booking IDs to retrieve the corresponding bookings.

value_schema.description: A non-empty list of [Booking](entity:Booking) IDs specifying bookings to retrieve.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the squareup API.

parameters.name: booking_ids
parameters.description: A non-empty list of [Booking](entity:Booking) IDs specifying bookings to retrieve.

value_schema.description: A non-empty list of [Booking](entity:Booking) IDs specifying bookings to retrieve.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
